span.span: if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會指出項目是否可見。This method does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情況下，項目可以在螢幕上，但仍不會顯示 （例如，其他項目被遮蔽的項目）。In some circumstances, the element can be on the screen but still not be visible (for example, an element that is obscured by other elements).
